xml.data:
Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 8 Nāgasaṃyutta » 8.1 Nāgavagga
8.1.9 Tatiyasutasutta
Nāgasaṃyutta
Nāgavagga
Tatiyasutasutta
350.
1170Sāvatthinidānaṃ. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—  “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā saṃsedajānaṃ nāgānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti? …pe…  Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā saṃsedajānaṃ nāgānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti.
1171Navamaṃ.
